import React, { useState } from "react"; function EmailSignatureForm() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [results, setResults] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", jobTitle: "", phoneNumber: "", color: "", }); const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(true); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); // Simulated results for demonstration setTimeout(() => { setResults( `Full Name: ${formData.firstName} ${formData.lastName}\nJob Title: ${formData.jobTitle}\nPhone Number: ${formData.phoneNumber}\nSelected Color: ${formData.color}` ); setLoading(false); }, 2000); setShowForm(false); }; const handleGoBack = () => { setShowForm(true); setResults(null); }; return (

); } export default EmailSignatureForm;
